Package Model

Class FightingEntity

java.lang.Object
Model.FightingEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Hero
public abstract class FightingEntity extends Object
Base Class for all Fighting Entities in the Game.

  • Method Details

    • get_AttackValue

      public int get_AttackValue()
      Gets the Attack Value of a Fighting Entity. The maximal Damage a Fighting Entity can make. It can be mitigated by the Defense Value.
      Returns:
      A double how much Damage the Fighting Entity can make.

    • get_DefenseValue

      public int get_DefenseValue()
      Gets the Defense Value of the Fighting Entity.
      Returns:
      How high the Defense Value is.

    • get_HitPoints

      public int get_HitPoints()
      Gets the HitPoints of the Fighting Entity.
      Returns:
      HitPoints of the Entity

      Reduces the HitPoints.
      Parameters:

    • Attack

      public void Attack(FightingEntity target)
      Executes an attack against the target.
      Parameters:
      target - : Fighting Entity that is attacked.

    • get_Type

      public FightingEntity.Type get_Type()
      Returns the Type of the Fighting Entity. Used to determine which Sprite should be shown.
